mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION_PAYMENT (merchant_uid, payment_id, pop_id, pts_id, user_id, amount, status) VALUES (#{merchantUid}, #{paymentId}, #{popId}, #{ptsId}, #{userId}, #{amount}, 'PENDING')
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION_PAYMENT SET status = 'PAID', paid_at = NOW() WHERE merchant_uid = #{merchantUid}
mapper.select: SELECT amount FROM RESERVATION_PAYMENT WHERE merchant_uid = #{merchantUid} LIMIT 1
